name: Legend Knight
detailed_description: 《Legend Knight》 is an epoch-making 3D fairy-sweeping game that integrates Xian Xia's lively combat and strategically-rich round battles. The new combat mode brings unparalleled combat experience to players and allows players to experience them. The situation is integrated into the magnificent world of Xian Xia.
